com.remotemonster.sdk

Class RemonObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.remotemonster.sdk.RemonObserver

  • public class RemonObserver
extends java.lang.Object
    If the Remon class is primarily focused on giving commands, then RemonObserver is a callback-only class that focuses on receiving events from the server
    Author:
    Reviser by lucas on 18. 1. 1.

      • onClose

        public void onClose()
        Called when the current remon object actually closes when it closes. You must call new on after this onClose is called before communicating or broadcasting again to remon.
